document_data.name: Tholone Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Tholone Lane''' was a short cobbled street in [[Suzail]] that connected [[Silverscales Street]] to the south with [[Nerester's Run]] to the northwest in an arch that slashed through a city block.{{cite web| url = http://candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_1112-04.htm| title = So Saith Ed Dec 2004 | accessdate = 13-04-2021| date = 13-04-2021}}

Description.Notable Locations:
*[[Murrock's Fine Glass]], or "the Black Rock" – a permanently blackened by fire stone storefront in the 14{{th}} century DR, before that – the headquarters of the Tireless Eyes trading coster.
*[[Valkur's Berth]], a well-hidden half-flooded temple to [[Valkur]] that also housed a busy smuggling operation as of the 14{{th}} century DR.
